title: swi_preprocess
description: Pre-process the Susceptibility-weighted images and write out nifti files for feeding into PRELUDE (Phase Unwrapping Library of FSL).

output_magnitude_file.description: Output magnitude file in NIfTI format.

output_phase_file.description: Output phase file in NIfTI format.
